about_the_game:
The TAGLINE Original Soundtrack features 43 futurist tracks full of sampling, scratching, and manic flair. These songs were composed by Alex Shammas.

DISC 1 Includes the hits you're looking for. Composed of challenge tracks, ambient tracks, and cut content!

DISC 2 Features shorter music found in secret areas and task terminal challenges.

DISC 1 & 2 are available in .MP3 and .FLAC formats.
Protected under Creative Commons NonCommercial license. Non-Commercial is permitted, but we prefer you credit us!

name: TAGLINE Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 197 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 389 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jam out to 43 futurist funk tracks with the TAGLINE soundtrack!
